name: SpaceHogs (Dragon Jam)
description:
NOTE: This is a small game made in 10 days for the GameDevNetwork: Dragon Jam.

Help captain Fisher to get his favorite food: pork chops.

In this turn based game, you navigate in different procedurally generated spaceships filled with fishmen and space hogs.

Go as far as you can.

Press Arrows to Move.

Press Space to Shoot.

If you get stuck press R.

Each step, you eat  a pork chop . When you have no more food to eat you start loosing live.

If you hit enemies, you loose life. No more live => you're dead.

Each enemies deal specific damage and have different loot repartition table.

When you have no more ammunition, you lose. You'll die anyway without your gun.

Good Luck.
